mapper.select: /* OrderMapper.getOrderProductInfo */ SELECT ORDER_PRODUCT_NO , ORDER_NO , ORDER_QTY , MENU_BOARD_SEQ , MENU_DAY , ORDER_SET , MENU_MSG , PAY_AMT , DELIVERY_TYPE , USED_POINT , CONFIRM_DT , REG_USER , REG_DT FROM ORDER_PRODUCT WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

/* OrderMapper.getOrderInfoDelivery */ SELECT A.ORDER_PRODUCT_NO , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_SET , A.MENU_DAY , B.RECEIVE_NAME , B.RECEIVE_TEL , B.RECEIVE_PHONE , B.RECEIVE_POST_NUM , B.RECEIVE_ADDR , B.RECEIVE_ADDR_DETAIL FROM ORDER_PRODUCT A JOIN ORDER_MST B ON A.ORDER_NO = B.ORDER_NO WHERE A.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}

/* OrderMapper.selectOrderPayConfirm */ SELECT TOTAL_PRODUCT_AMT + TOTAL_DELY_AMT + (CASE WHEN DELIV_KIND = 2000 THEN 4000 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN PACKAGING = 1000 THEN 5000 ELSE 0 END) AS totalMoney FROM ORDER_MST WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderId}
